  • Method Details

    • viewUserAccount

      @GetMapping("/user-account") public String viewUserAccount(org.springframework.ui.Model model, @AuthenticationPrincipal UserSecurityDetails userDetails)
      Displays the user account page.

      Retrieves the authenticated user's public information and adds it to the model. Prepares the necessary data for the view to render the user's account details.

      Parameters:
      model - the model to which attributes are added for rendering the view
      userDetails - the authenticated user's security details provided by Spring Security
      Returns:
      the name of the view template for the user account page

    • updateEmail

      @PostMapping("/update-email") public String updateEmail(@ModelAttribute UserConfigChangeEmailFormDto userConfigChangeEmailFormDto, @AuthenticationPrincipal UserSecurityDetails userDetails, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Handles the request to update a user's email address.

      This method receives the new email and current password, verifies the user's identity, and attempts to update the email address. Proper error handling is applied for invalid inputs or mismatches.

      On success or failure, an appropriate flash message is added for display on redirect.

      Parameters:
      userConfigChangeEmailFormDto - the form object containing the new email and current password
      userDetails - the authenticated user's security details, used to retrieve the user ID
      redirectAttributes - used to pass flash messages after redirect
      Returns:
      a redirect to the user account page

    • deleteAccountForm

      @GetMapping("/delete-account-advise") public String deleteAccountForm(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap interfaceScreen, @AuthenticationPrincipal UserSecurityDetails userDetails)
      Displays the account deletion advice page with the current user's nickname.
      Parameters:
      interfaceScreen - the model map to pass attributes to the view
      userDetails - the authenticated user's security details
      Returns:
      the view name for the account deletion advice page

    • deleteAccountEnd

      @GetMapping("/delete-account-confirm") public String deleteAccountEnd(org.springframework.ui.ModelMap interfaceScreen, @AuthenticationPrincipal UserSecurityDetails userDetails)
      Displays the account deletion confirmation page with the current user's nickname.
      Parameters:
      interfaceScreen - the model map to pass attributes to the view
      userDetails - the authenticated user's security details
      Returns:
      the view name for the account deletion confirmation page

    • deleteAccount

      @PostMapping("/delete-account-confirm") public String deleteAccount(@AuthenticationPrincipal UserSecurityDetails userDetails, @RequestParam String password, @RequestParam String confirmPassword, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Handles the POST request to confirm account deletion. Validates the provided password and confirmation password, deactivates the user account if valid, and initiates the recovery email process. On success, redirects to the deletion advice page with a success message. On failure, redirects back to the confirmation page with an appropriate error message.
      Parameters:
      userDetails - the authenticated user's security details
      password - the password provided by the user for confirmation
      confirmPassword - the confirmation of the password
      redirectAttributes - used to pass flash attributes during redirect
      request - the HTTP servlet request to build domain URL
      Returns:
      redirect URL to either the deletion advice page on success or back to the confirmation page on failure

    • reactivateAccount

      @GetMapping("/reactivate-account") public String reactivateAccount(@RequestParam("token") String token, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the account reactivation process using a token. Attempts to reactivate the user account linked to the provided token. On success, shows a success message and returns the reactivation confirmation page. On failure, shows an error message and returns an error page.
      Parameters:
      token - the reactivation token provided as a request parameter
      model - the Spring MVC model to pass attributes to the view
      Returns:
      the name of the view to be rendered

    • deleteAdvise

      @GetMapping("delete-advise") public String deleteAdvise()
      Displays the deletion advice page after account deactivation.
      Returns:
      the name of the deletion advice view page

    • viewUserProfile

      @GetMapping("/user-profile") public String viewUserProfile(org.springframework.ui.Model model, UserProfileDTO userProfileDTO, @AuthenticationPrincipal UserSecurityDetails userDetails)
      Displays the user profile page. Initializes the user's languages collection to avoid lazy loading issues. Adds the public user information and list of all available languages to the model.
      Parameters:
      model - the Spring MVC model to pass attributes to the view
      userProfileDTO - DTO object representing user profile data (used for form binding)
      userDetails - the authenticated user's security details
      Returns:
      the name of the user profile view page

    • updateUserProfile

      @PostMapping("/update-user-profile") public String updateUserProfile(@ModelAttribute("profileDto") UserProfileDTO userProfileDTO, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes, @AuthenticationPrincipal UserSecurityDetails userDetails)
      Handles the update of the user's profile, including nickname, profile picture, and languages. Validates and applies changes to the user's data by invoking the corresponding service methods. Adds appropriate success or error messages as flash attributes for feedback in the redirected view. Refreshes the user's authentication details after a successful update.
      Parameters:
      userProfileDTO - the DTO containing the updated profile data from the form
      redirectAttributes - attributes for flash messages to be used after redirect
      userDetails - the authenticated user's security details
      Returns:
      the redirect URL to the user profile page
